......
...
With the defenses of the outer fortress breached, Alicia's knights mounted an offense, using the inner walls as their last stronghold.
However, on an impulse, the mercenaries set flame to the commoner's quarters which lay between the inner and outer walls of the fortress.
The mercenaries overran the city without any mercy.
They thrive on violence and plunder, sending commoners fleeing as they can do nothing but scream and wail.

Alicia's voice echoed sharply on the city walls.

Despite the unmitigated odds, the knights were well organized around Alicia, and they continued their battle without losing their will to fight.

#op_005
This land is one large continent known as Serenus.
Monsterous creatures live in the hinterlands to the north. From the moment of their birth, they are loathed by the other races of this land.
These monsters threatened the likes of the other races, sullied their flesh, and stole their goods. They live only for the heights of pleasure.
The war started when these evil creatures came into being, and it has continued for thousands of years.
These evil creatures are extraordinarily capricious. They acted purely on instinct, knowing not of organization or leadership.
It is for that reason, the war was carried out under a scheme of preventing them from heading south as they normally did.
The humans, dwarves, halflings, and other races view the southern migration of these evil beings as akin to a seasonal disaster like a flood or typhoon.
There is no religious reasoning or economic surplus that motivated or allowed the people to chase the wicked beings into their homelands.
However, a change is coming to these intermittent, seasonal battles.
Several hundred years ago, a large castle suddenly appeared at the entrance to the north. It is called the Black Keep.
Its appearance was the beginning of the change in eras.
Around the Black Keep, the land was instantly turned barren through powerful magics.
There was no day or night in that area. The sky was always christened a blood red.
A miasma hung in the air. The land was barren. The bubbling waters also all turned to poisonous green swamps.
The humans, elves, dwarves, and halflings had their strength stolen from them and their bodies deteriorated just by living there.
A rumor began to spread that a single beautiful dark elf had taken residence in the Black Keep and ruled those barren lands as the Jet Black Queen.
The land came to be called the Kingdom of the Jet Black Queen because all life deteriorated there.
But there was an exception.
Ogres, orcs, goblins, trolls, and gargoyles. All the creatures with wicked desires came from the northern hinterlands and gathered in that cursed land.
The hostile environment made it a land of the dead for humans and elves... But it was a land of abundance for those monsters.
The queen's magic gave all those wicked creatures in her kingdom immense power.
Their already immense power was multiplied several times over and their wounds started to heal in an instant.
The powerful regenerative properties granted to these creatures were enough to allow an arm to be grown back as soon as it was torn off.
These creatures began an assault.
With their amplified power, they could march out from the queen's kingdom without weakening.
However, they had made a great miscalculation.
Those under assault allied and built seven forts along the northern entrance faster than the evil creatures could begin their march south.
There was a reason the now allied races could come together so quickly.
It is the existence of the reborn goddess, one of the high elves.
The high elves are seen as a holy symbol of the church. They foretold of the danger that would come from the Black Keep.
The high elves are known to be nearly clairvoyant. They would even sometimes have revelations with clear visions of the future.
And due to previous predictions, a high degree of trust was placed in their words. The kings of each country placed much importance on their words.
At the high elves' request, each king or other holder of power gathered. And with the church's backing, the alliance formed very quickly.
The seven nations formed the Seven Shield Alliance. The alliance army was broken into seven forces and seven fortresses were erected on the border to the Kingdom of the Jet Black Queen.
The high elves pushed past objections from the church and kings and moved to Fortress Seven.
The high elves prayed for a faster end to the war in the White Citadel they built in Fortress Seven.
However, the two armies are evenly matched. The battles last for hundreds of years with only brief moments of peace.
The long war leads to many professional mercenaries. The alliance army uses the mercenary corps to bolster the knights that made up their core.
Several different mercenary corps are born, and the presence of mercenaries grows.
However, these mercenary corps are nothing more than a loose band of individuals.
They are nothing more than a group of people who could only mingle with the official army, make money, and lose it on daily pleasures.
However, with the appearance of a single man, this loose association of mercenaries starts to become a single giant army.
His name is Vult.
He leads an army of mercenaries that doesn't descriminate on race. He only cares about the strength of the mercenary and even allows the evil races like ogres to join his army.
And so Vult's army of mercenaries begins to take the place as a third party that is neither the allied army nor the demon army.
Vult's mercenary army is no longer a loose collection of small fries. They have grown into a force that can rival the allied army and the demon army.
The high elves predict another change.
The high elves predict the waning of the queen's power.
The allied army is delighted at this revelation.
Delegates from each army gather at the White Citadel to determine the strength of their forces.
They want to use this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to bring down the Black Keep and chase the vile races back to the northern hinterlands.
